entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening. A few showers beginning near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
